org.richfaces.fragment.tooltip

Class RichFacesTooltip<CONTENT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.richfaces.fragment.tooltip.RichFacesTooltip<CONTENT>
  • Type Parameters:
    CONTENT -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AdvancedInteractions<RichFacesTooltip.AdvancedTooltipInteractions>, AdvancedVisibleComponentIteractions<RichFacesTooltip.AdvancedTooltipInteractions>, Tooltip<CONTENT>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    TextualRichFacesTooltip

    public abstract class RichFacesTooltip<CONTENT>
extends Object
implements Tooltip<CONTENT>, AdvancedVisibleComponentIteractions<RichFacesTooltip.AdvancedTooltipInteractions>
    The root of this tooltip will be used for invoking this tooltip. In other words: set root of this toolTip to the panel on which can be the toolTip invoked so you don't have to set the target before invoking.
    Author:
    Jiri Stefek

      • hide

        public RichFacesTooltip<CONTENT> hide()
        Description copied from interface: Tooltip
        Dismiss the tooltip, which is found by injected root element to his component. Note that, hiding of the tooltip should be rather by implicit action (for example hover of the mouse out from some element), than this explicit call.
        Specified by:
        hide in interface Tooltip<CONTENT>
        Returns:
        tooltip itself

      • show

        public RichFacesTooltip<CONTENT> show()
        Description copied from interface: Tooltip
        Invokes the tooltip over an element, which is found by injected root element to his component. Note that, invoking of the tooltip should be rather by implicit action (for example hover of the mouse over some element), than this explicit call.
